name: Insectum Ltd.
membership: Internation Platform for Insects as Food and Feed (http://ipiff.org)
goal: Insectum Ltd. is an insect growing start-up, which aims to recycle food waste and grow on them insects as feed for non food-chain animals.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety
euInitiatives: Active member in International Platform for Insects as Food and Feed, which would like to see a more food waste being allowed to recycle using insects (specifically Hermetia illucens (latin.) or Black soldier fly (eng.)). Main interest is to work regarding EC Regulation 1069/2009.
